code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChoferDashboard=()=>{const[bikes,setBikes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/bikes').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setBikes(data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error al cargar bicicletas:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Bicicletas asignadas al chofer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:bikes.map(bike=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[bike.brand," - ",bike.model," (",bike.status,")"]},bike.id))})]});};export{ChoferDashboard};
